Week 5

This week, we cover topics including: deeper dives into Design foundations, deep dives into Photoshop & Illustrator. And, starting Thursday afternoon, a Hackathon with Front End and Ruby on Rails classes. Also, looking forward to Jesse and Brandon’s lecture on Sass and Grids!
